TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
the "season" is a three minute advertisement for coca cola that incorporates the setting and characters of that show.

I whish for everyone in the world to have a british accent

Granted. Everyone is now addicted to tea.

I wish for more wishes.

Granted.  Everybody but you gets more wishes.

I wish I knew what to do with all these wishes.

Granted. You know what to do with them. But are not able to.

I wish to open another thread.

granted. go open another unrelated thread.

I wish for name coloration on the forums

Granted. Everyone's name is now colored black.

I wish for math to non-exist.

Granted. The laws of physics begin to break down as you collapse into a pile of goo, and then the universe implodes.

I wish for more wishes.

Granted.  Go look at the last time I corrupted this one, cuz that's what happens now.

I wish people weren't strange when you're a stranger.

Granted. A strangelet hits the Earth. No strange things anymore.

I wish for Dull quark in addition to the Strange one.

Granted. whatever that is happens but everything in the universe simultaneously implodes and explodes in a quantum state and then disappears.

#phyziks

I wish for danny2462 to post a video

Alright, danny2462 posts his finale video.

I wish for my history teacher to quit.

Instead of quitting, they become really fun, but after you graduate...

I wish I knew how to do gravity assists to get a ship with very little fuel back to kerbin

Granted. You throw the ship up, and the gravity pulls it down, so it returns to Kerbin. The less of fuel - the lighter is the ship to throw.

I wish to enter the password. (No, seriously). And I'm going to do that right now.

Now you don’t know where to enter it

 

i wish that a random thing happens

Granted. You won a lottery, and now you may take you prize in any regional office of the First Intergalactic Bank.

I wish you can find it.

Granted, but the ticket expired 1 day prior to his finding it.

I wish I had perfectly manicured nails at all times.

Granted, you have no nails. You can't have improper nails if you don't have nails at all.

I wish for unlimited coffee

Granted. You should gather unlimited amount of coffee while the sun lights the plantation.

I wish the fur-trees were giving furs.

Granted. However your spelling is wrong so you get nothing. 
I wish for something?

Granted. You get some thing.

I wish it's not a no thing.

Every song is now filled with even more double-negatives.

I wosh for lotss off roin.

29 minutes ago, Fraston said:

Every song is now filled with even more double-negatives.

I wosh for lotss off roin.

Granted, but your spelling check system corrupted, sending all texts to minion speak.

I wish for some 20 dollar bills, in USD.

Wish granted; you now have $52k of $20 bills. But they are all counterfeit and the U.S. Secret Service is already knocking at your door.

I wish that @Mikenike would be kidnapped by a bunch of My Little Pony fans and subjected to watching Teletubbies with them for the rest of the day.

Granted.  @adsii1970, you are kidnapped along with him, and forced to watch and sing along.  When you have finished watching every episode, the kidnappers decide you haven't had enough and put on Barney, followed by season 1 of Zoobilee Zoo.  Oh, and you are forced to dress like Whazzat Kangaroo for the rest of your life.

I wish I didn't know what Zoobilee Zoo was.  Oh, my fragile little mind.

Wish granted. You've been kidnapped along with me and @Mikenike and suffer the same fate we did. Except, they hot glue earphones to your ears and make you listen to then themesong for Zoobilee Zoo on repeat - indefinitely.

I wish for a foot of snow...
